Then, move forward to confront Aunt Ethel. You need to burn all her mushrooms and then throw the potion on her to save Varna. Kill Aunt Ethel and report to Mayrina to complete this quest.

How to unlock Help the Hag Survivors

You can unlock this interacting with the Hag Survivor Group pamphlets strewn across the city.
